I am so sorry Jim :(

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: nightshade455=
 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, October 09, 2009 9:50 PM
 =
 Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC


    I have been a lu=
rker here for sometime... I find the subject fascinating, but my tecnnical =
skills are so limited I rarely feel like I can contribute anything to the g=
roup. This post touched me so deeply, though, I felt I had to reply.

  I h=
ave lost a number of well loved animal companions over the years, from Blac=
k Labs to White Ferrets to cats of various persuasions. (The most recent be=
ing a tawny colored short-hair named O'Rafferty, who looked like a pigmy pu=
ma.) 

  While I have little experience with animal EVP's, I have no doubt =
that I will see them all again someday. If they are not waiting for me on t=
he other side, I'm not going...

  Would love to see posts from anyone that=
 has experience with animal EVP's or other proof of companion animal surviv=
al. Do those on the other side have anything to say about this subject?

  =
I deeply sympathise with your loss... Just reading your post brought tears =
to my eyes.

  Nightshade

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com wrote:
  >
  > 
  > Hello,
  > 
  > This email message is a notif=
ication to let you know that
  > a file has been uploaded to the Files area=
 of the EVP-ITC 
  > group.
  > 
  > File : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/I_dont_kno=
w-evp.mp3 
  > Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  > Description :=
 My Cat (my best friend) was DOA to the Animal Rescue Leage here in town. I=
He was missing for 4 days and on Friday I went to the pound and found that =
he had been struck by a car (the first night he didn't come home). Severe s=
pinal injury and they had to give him the shot. I asked about him (on the o=
ther side)...well seems like they don't have the answers either. Glad tjey =
heard me though.....maybe he does too. Gonna miss him. 
  > 
  > You can ac=
cess this file at the URL:
  > http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/=
Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/I_dont_know-evp.mp3 
  > 
  > To learn more abo=
ut file sharing for your group, please visit:
  > http://help.yahoo.com/l/u=
s/yahoo/groups/original/general.htmlfiles
  > 
  > Regards,
  > 
  > clockd=
ryve <clockdryve@...>
  >
